NAME.description: The display name for the add-on

URL.description: Location of a remote version file for update checking

DOWNLOAD.description: Web address where the latest version can be downloaded

CHANGE_LOG.description: The complete or incremental change log for the add-on

CHANGE_LOG_URL.description: Populates the CHANGE_LOG field using the file at this url

GITHUB.description: Allows KSP-AVC to do release checks with GitHub including setting a download location if one is not specified. If the latest release version is not equal to the version in the file, an update notification will not appear.

REPOSITORY.description: The name of the source repository

ALLOW_PRE_RELEASE.description: Include pre-releases in the latest release search

KERBAL_STUFF_URL.description: URL to this mod's page on KerbalStuff

KSP_VERSION.description: Version of KSP that the add-on was made to support

KSP_VERSION_MIN.description: Minimum version of KSP that the add-on supports

KSP_VERSION_MAX.description: Maximum version of KSP that the add-on supports

DISALLOW_VERSION_OVERRIDE.description: If true, don't trust KSP-AVC's idea of which game versions are compatible with which other game versions, based on user configuration

ASSEMBLY_NAME.description: DO NOT USE, won't work with CKAN; name of a DLL to check for VERSION on the fly

KSP_VERSION_INCLUDE.description: DO NOT USE, won't work with CKAN; a list of versions with which this mod is compatible

KSP_VERSION_EXCLUDE.description: DO NOT USE, won't work with CKAN; a list of versions with which this mod is incompatible

LOCAL_HAS_PRIORITY.description: DO NOT USE, won't work with CKAN; if true, don't override properties using the remote version file

REMOTE_HAS_PRIORITY.description: DO NOT USE, won't work with CKAN; if false, don't override properties using the remote version file

INSTALL_LOC|INSTALL_LOC*.description: Stanza to define file location to check, used by MADLAD

MAJOR.description: Change major version when you make incompatible API changes

MINOR.description: Change minor version when you add functionality in a backwards-compatible manner

PATCH.description: Change patch version when you make backwards-compatible bug fixes

NAME.description: Name of the mod, If not specified, uses the Modname from the .version file

PATH.description: Path to the directory, begins below the GameData.  Must be there, but will be empty in most cases

FILE.description: filename to be checked.  If not specified, then it checks for the directory only
